member.name: IMFByteStreamProxyClassFactory.CreateByteStreamProxy
member.summary: Creates a proxy to a byte stream. The proxy enables a media source to read from a byte stream in another process.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the byte stream to proxy.
The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamProxyClassFactory
member.summary: Creates a proxy to a byte stream.
